EmailTemplate.name: First Funding Partner Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations on your First Funding!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Tell us how it went!
Thank you for choosing us!
Congratulations on your first funding with RapidAdvance! We hope this is the beginning of long partnership with many more closed deals.
As our valued partner, we want to know how we can make your experience better. Please fill out Partner Survey to let us know how we can improve. It takes less than 5 minutes and your feedback will help us better serve you AND your clients.
Take Survey http://www.getfeedback.com/r/eAbGPlyM
Thanks again for being a RapidAdvance Partner!
